meanings.definition: A small cape worn as a decorative garment.
meanings.sent1: She wore delicate capelets to the elegant party.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer showcased her latest collection of capelets.
meanings.sent3: The capelets danced in the breeze as if they had a life of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of capelets was a rainbow of colors fluttering in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The capelets sparkled under the moonlight, adding a touch of magic to her outfit.

meanings.definition: A garment resembling a cape but shorter in length.
meanings.sent1: The actress donned stylish capelets on the red carpet.
meanings.sent2: The store displayed a variety of trendy capelets for sale.
meanings.sent3: The capelets giggled amongst themselves, feeling proud of their unique style.
meanings.sent4: Her capelets were like little wings, giving her an air of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The capelets hugged her shoulders snugly, keeping her warm on the chilly evening.
